alert.note: Alert for Cedar; Iowa; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 7:36PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Iowa, northeastern Washington, Muscatine, southwestern Cedar, northwestern Louisa and southern Johnson Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 736 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near West Branch to near Hills to near Kalona. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... West Branch around 740 PM CDT. Lone Tree around 745 PM CDT. West Liberty, Riverside and Nichols around 750 PM CDT. Conesville and Atalissa around 755 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Wilton, Letts, Fruitland, Cotter and Muscatine. This includes Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 249 and 264. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cedar; Iowa; Johnson; Louisa; Muscatine; Washington
